name: Pui Pui Molcar Let’s! Molcar Party!
name_original: Pui Pui Molcar Let’s! Molcar Party!
description: Based on the popular stop-motion animated series Pui Pui Molcar, this party game for four players has the fuzzy guinea pig cars competing with each other in ten different minigames. These minigames are hugely varied from each other, taking the form of anything from soccer to late-night competitions. Players have several different molcars to choose between, and as they play they can unlock new cars and new outfits.
